subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[escape]]; to [[run away]]
# to [[evade]]; to [[abscond]]; to [[dodge]]
# 49th [[tetragram]] of the [[Taixuanjing]]; "flight" ([[𝌶]])
